/* Ethnicity and race */ Paragraph edited for flow and style.
/* Terminology and definition */ copyedit to agree with sources cited below
"Ethnicity is a fundamental factor in human life: it is a phenomenon inherent in human experience."
'''ethnic group''' are conscious of belonging to an ethnic group; moreover ethnic identity

/* Ethnicity in specific countries */ fix links
